text_title: The Window and the Blue Curtain

questions.question: What has covered Jonas's window for the last four months?
Why does Mrs. Weller knock on Jonas's door?

options.A: She needs to borrow some sugar.
options.B: She wants to complain about noise.
options.C: Birds are building a nest in his air conditioner.
options.D: She locked herself out of her apartment.

questions.question: How does Jonas feel at the beginning of the story?
What does Jonas do after he helps Mrs. Weller with the birds?

options.C: He pulls the curtain aside and eventually opens the window.
options.D: He moves to a different apartment.

questions.question: Where does Jonas go at the end of the story?

options.A: To a riverside gathering with music and lanterns.
